actionCalls.description: Dummy apex action to force the DML operation to update the Progress Note record from the Write Note and Sign subflow so we can reference the updated field on the Progress Note.
actionCalls.name: Dummy_Action
actionCalls.label: Dummy Action

assignments.description: Assigns itemId in varNoteAndEncounterParameters to the value in the write note and sign apex action result.
assignments.name: Assign_itemId_in_varNoteAndEncounterParameters
assignments.label: Assign itemId in varNoteAndEncounterParameters

assignments.description: Assigning a value to the variable from the Write Note and Sign results
assignments.name: Assign_systemModifiedOutputToVista
assignments.label: Assign systemModifiedOutputToVista

assignments.description: Set eSig in preparation for signing the note. Also, clear the signature code error.
assignments.name: Assignment_After_Review_Sign
assignments.label: Assignment After Review & Sign

assignments.description: Setting the signature code error variable
assignments.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Set_Signature_Code_Error
assignments.label: Set Signature Code Error

assignments.description: Setting the variables from the Code Set Assignment subflow
assignments.name: Set_Variables_After_CodeSet_Assignment_Subflow
assignments.label: Set Variables After CodeSet Assignment Subflow

assignments.description: Setting the variables to null prior to the code set assignment subflow
assignments.name: Set_Variables_Before_CodeSet_Assignment_Subflow
assignments.label: Set Variables Before CodeSet Assignment Subflow

assignments.description: Setting Signed to True since the signature was successful
assignments.name: Set_VCC_Signed_c_to_true
assignments.label: Set VCC_Signed__c to 'true'

decisions.description: Checking if the Progress Note is partially integrated or not. If so, we will attempt to pick up from the prior failure with the Resume Consolidated endpoint subflow
decisions.name: IntegrationStatus
decisions.label: Integration Status?

decisions.description: Determining if this is a Pharmacy Progress Note
decisions.name: Is_this_a_Pharmacy_PN
decisions.label: Is this a Pharmacy PN?

decisions.description: Determining how to handle the failure
decisions.name: Resume_Partial_Integration_Error_Handle
decisions.label: What now? (Resume Partially Integrated)

decisions.description: Determining if the action was successful
decisions.name: Was_Resume_Partial_Integration_Success
decisions.label: Was Resume Partially Integrated A Success?

decisions.description: Was Write Note And Sign A Success?
decisions.name: Was_Write_Note_And_Sign_Successful
decisions.label: Was Write Note And Sign Successful?

decisions.description: Determining if the action was successful
decisions.name: WasResumeAfterWriteSuccessful
decisions.label: Was Resume After Write Successful?

decisions.description: Handle write note and sign flow error
decisions.name: Write_Note_And_Sign_Error_Handle
decisions.label: What now? (Write Note & Sign)

Flow.description:
This flow integrates an Progress Note with VistA via the DAS API.
Release 1.16.0 - CCCM-31263 Release 1.17.1 - CCCM-41413 - Corrected Duplicate Encounters and Removed Retry Logic

formulas.description: Checks to see if user is a pharmacy user to control visibility for new progress note button
formulas.name: formulaCheckForPharmUser

formulas.description: Current User First and Last Name
formulas.name: formulaCurrentUserName

formulas.description: Is true if the patient has duplicate records
formulas.name: formulaHasDuplicateRecords

Flow.label: VCC DAS Sign & Integrate VCC_Progress_Note__c

recordLookups.description: Getting the DAS Last Error Code field value from the Progress Note.
recordLookups.name: Get_Updated_Progress_Note_for_DAS_Last_Error_Code_Field
recordLookups.label: Get Updated Progress Note for DAS Last Error Code Field

fields.name: Progress_Note_Signed_Successfully
fields.fieldText: Progress Note signed successfully!

fields.name: New_Progress_Note_Message
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add another Progress Note to the Case?

subflows.description: Invoke VCC Sign Note Subflow Code Assignment
subflows.name: Code_Assignment_Subflow
subflows.label: Code Assignment Subflow

value.stringValue: Unhandled exception in flow "VCC DAS Sign & Integrate VCC_Progress_Note__c"

subflows.description: Invoke VCC Sign Note Subflow: Progress Note Created in CPRS
subflows.name: Progress_Note_created_in_CPRS
subflows.label: Progress Note created in CPRS?

subflows.description: Invoke VCC Sign Note Subflow: DAS Resume Consolidated Endpoint Failure
subflows.name: Resume_Consolidated_Endpoint_After_Write_Note_And_Sign
subflows.label: Resume Consolidated Endpoint (Write Note & Sign)

subflows.description: Try to complete the integration from a previous attempt.
subflows.name: Resume_Consolidated_Endpoint_Partially_Integrated
subflows.label: Resume Consolidated Endpoint (Partially Integrated)

subflows.description: User reviews and signs the progress note
subflows.name: Review_and_Sign
subflows.label: Review & Sign

subflows.description: Invoke VCC Sign Note Subflow FRR
subflows.name: VCC_Sign_Note_Subflow_FRR_Flow
subflows.label: VCC Sign Note Subflow FRR Flow

subflows.description: Invoke VCC Sign Note Subflow: DAS Write Note and Sign
subflows.name: Write_Note_And_Sign
subflows.label: Write Note & Sign

textTemplates.description: Display Signed and Electronic Signature fields
textTemplates.name: Progress_Note_Signature_Fields

variables.description: Stores the error code, if any, that is returned from the DAS API call
variables.name: errorCode

variables.description: Is true if the Save Note and Encounter Apex Action from the Write Note and Sign subflow was a success.
variables.name: saveNoteEncounterSuccess

variables.description: Is true if user input was modified during the process of sending the note to VistA (via DIP/VDIF).
variables.name: systemModifiedOutputToVista

variables.description: Is true if the Progress Note is an encounterable one
variables.name: varIsEncounter

variables.description: Indicates whether the button was pressed on the lwc vccNewProgressNoteButton
variables.name: varNewProgressNoteButtonPressed

variables.description: Is true if the patient provided video consent
variables.name: varPatientVideoConsent

variables.description: Stores the Progress Note Configuration record
variables.name: varProgressNoteConfiguration

variables.description: Stores the type of the Virtual Visit
variables.name: varVirtualVisitType

variables.description: The VISN number were the duplicate patient record exists
variables.name: varVisnNumberWithDuplicates
